title: Who is the best player at Riot?
body: Just curious but who is the best LoL Player in the Riot offices? :)

replies.body:
"In the Riot Offices?"

I shall come in at 4am on Sunday to claim my title!
Well, not to toot my own horn, but I am level 22 **AND** have about a 50% win rate...
Llama, you are obviously top player.
My money's on Bob Llama. You can't really argue with a win rate like that.

We have a guy in Core Gameplay, LoveMyRM aka RiotChun who was in his Challenger promos last night.

I'm one of about 1-2 dozen Diamond I players here. Don't know how we all stack up, really.
Wow I had no idea there were that many ultra-high tier players in Riot, your in-office tournies must be amazing. Do you stream those at all? At least, assuming you have in-office tournies.

I actually lost to Jesse in Solo Queue not too long ago! XD

http://imgur.com/5ysQXqA
No, it was pretty shameful. Back in the day there was a time when it was Unversable>Jesse.

<3 Phreak

You will always be my favorite Tonnes of damage dealer

Most people on Riot Live Design are pretty good. Statikk and Roku will always be Legends to me. They were really good and fun to play against in Solo Queue. :p Nowadays I think the best in in solo queue might be someone like RiotChun.
My money's on Lyte, Teamwork and good sportsmanship OP right? XD
